title: Task List: basic render with skeleton and empty states
description: Verify the tasks list page renders skeleton state during loading and shows empty state CTA when no tasks exist; ensure list items display title, status badge, repo, and timestamp when data available.

steps.description: Navigate to /tasks route with network throttled to simulate loading
Skeleton list with 5 placeholder items is visible
Let network complete; return API response with zero tasks
Empty state UI is shown with CTA to create a new task
Return API response with multiple tasks (vary statuses)
Each task list item shows title, status badge, repository, and relative timestamp

title: Task List: search input debounces 300ms and returns results
description: Verify typing in search input triggers API calls after 300ms debounce; rapid typing should not flood requests and final query should return expected filtered results.

steps.description: Open tasks page and focus search field
Type 'fix' quickly then add 'bug' within 100ms intervals (simulate rapid typing)
No API call fired until 300ms after last keystroke
Wait 350ms and inspect outgoing API request
Single API request executed with query 'fixbug' (or final accumulated value) and results rendered

title: Task List: multi-status filtering and combined state
description: Verify filtering by multiple statuses returns tasks matching any selected statuses and UI updates correctly.

steps.description: Open filters and select statuses 'planning' and 'in_progress'
Apply filter
API request includes both statuses and returned list contains tasks in either 'planning' or 'in_progress'
Status badges in the list reflect the actual task statuses

title: Create Task Dialog: form validation (Zod) and success flow
description: Validate required fields, Zod schema enforcement, toast on success, and redirect to new task detail on successful create.

steps.description: Open Create Task dialog from tasks page
Submit the form with empty fields
Form validation errors shown for required fields (title, description, repo URL)
Enter title 'A', description shorter than 10 chars, invalid repo URL 'not-a-git'
Zod-specific error shown for description length and repo URL format (expects GitHub url)
Fill valid title, description >=10 chars, repo URL in GitHub format, leave branch blank, add multiple tags and build command, submit
Success toast appears and app redirects to /tasks/[taskId] of newly created task; branch defaults to 'main' in task metadata

title: Create Task Dialog: server error handling on create
description: When API returns 500 or validation error from server, the UI should show an error toast and not redirect.

steps.description: Open form, fill valid inputs and submit; mock server to return 500
Error toast displayed with retry option and dialog remains open
Mock server returns validation error object for repo URL
Form maps server-side validation to field-level error for repo URL

title: Task Detail: tabs persist selection across navigation
description: Ensure Overview/Logs/Changes tab selection persists when navigating within task detail and on route refresh; per-route loading and error boundaries operate properly.

steps.description: Open a task detail page and click on 'Changes' tab
Navigate to another route and then return to this task detail
Tab selection remains on 'Changes'
Refresh the page
Selected tab persists and loading skeletons show while data loads

title: Real-time Logs (SSE): receive 'log' and 'status' events and render color-coded entries
description: SSE should stream log and status events; logs render within 100ms, color-coded by level, and connection indicator reflects connected state.

steps.description: On a task in 'in_progress', open Logs tab which establishes SSE connection
Mock server to emit a 'log' event with level 'error' and message
Log entry appears in the log stream within 100ms and styled as error color
Mock server emits a 'status' event transitioning to 'awaiting_review'
Status badge in header updates to 'awaiting_review' and a status event entry is visible in logs
Connection status indicator shows 'connected' state

title: Real-time Logs (SSE): auto-reconnect after 3s on disconnect
description: When SSE connection is closed unexpectedly, client attempts reconnect after ~3s and indicates reconnecting status; resumes receiving events after reconnect.

steps.description: Establish SSE connection in Logs tab
Simulate abrupt server-side SSE close (connection dropped)
Connection indicator shows disconnected/error and a toast is shown
Advance time ~3s to allow auto-reconnect attempt
Client re-establishes SSE, connection indicator returns to connected, and a reconnection log entry is present

title: Logs: auto-scroll toggle and copy/clear functions
description: Verify auto-scroll follows new logs when enabled; when disabled, auto-scroll stops. Copy copies visible logs to clipboard and Clear removes visible logs UI.

steps.description: Open Logs tab, enable auto-scroll, and have SSE send several log events
Scrollbar moves to bottom as logs arrive
Disable auto-scroll, send new logs
Scroll position remains and does not jump to bottom
Click 'Copy logs' control
Clipboard contains visible logs text formatted; toast confirms copy
Click 'Clear logs' control and confirm when prompted
Visible logs area is empty

title: Task Actions: Execute -> status transitions and loading states
description: Start execution from task detail and validate API call, loading spinners, and status transitions from backlog -> planning -> in_progress with logs streaming.

steps.description: Open a task in 'backlog' status and click 'Execute' action
Confirmation dialog appears; confirm execution
Mock API to accept execute request and emit status events backlog->planning->in_progress
Execute button shows loading/spinner during request; header status updates to planning then in_progress; logs tab starts receiving SSE logs

title: Task Actions: Cancel with confirmation stops execution and shows final status
description: Cancel action should present confirmation, call API, halt further logs, and set task status to 'cancelled' with appropriate toasts and UI updates.

steps.description: Open a task currently 'in_progress' and click 'Cancel'
Confirmation dialog is shown explaining cancel consequences
Confirm cancel; mock API to succeed and SSE to stop emitting additional logs
Task status updates to 'cancelled', toast confirms cancellation, and no new logs are appended after cancel

title: Task Actions: Approve flow when awaiting_review
description: Approve action must be available in awaiting_review, show confirmation, call API, update status to approved/done, and expose PR URL in metadata.

steps.description: Open a task in 'awaiting_review' and open Changes tab
Diffs and file list are visible and Approve button is enabled
Click Approve, confirm dialog, mock approve API to return PR URL and status 'approved' then 'done'
Status badge updates to 'approved' then 'done', toast confirms approval, and PR URL is visible and clickable in task metadata

title: Task Actions: Retry re-executes failed task and shows loading
description: Retry should be enabled for failed tasks, call retry endpoint, set loading state, and transition back to planning/in_progress with logs resuming.

steps.description: Open a task with status 'failed' and click 'Retry'
Confirmation dialog appears; on confirm, Retry button shows loading
Mock retry API to accept and SSE to resume streaming logs and status transitions
Task progresses to 'in_progress' and logs begin streaming again

title: Diff Viewer: file list icons and split/unified toggle
description: Verify file list renders change type icons for added/modified/deleted, toggling between split and unified modes updates diff rendering and preserves selection.

steps.description: Open Changes tab for a task with multiple file changes
File list shows icons for added (+), modified (~), and deleted (-) files
Toggle diff mode to 'split' and then to 'unified'
Diff rendering updates accordingly and syntax highlighting persists; currently selected file remains open after toggle

title: Diff Viewer: DiffStats counts and visual bar respects dark mode
description: Diff statistics should match additions/deletions numbers; visual bar renders proportionally and adapts to dark-mode styles when theme toggled.

steps.description: Open Changes tab and inspect DiffStats for a sample commit diff
Additions and deletions numbers match diff contents and visual bar proportion reflects ratio
Toggle theme to dark mode
Diff viewer and DiffStats switch to dark-mode appropriate colors and remain legible

title: Feedback System: send feedback via button and Ctrl+Enter, history and log inclusion
description: Feedback form accepts messages up to 2000 chars, Ctrl+Enter submits form, feedback appears in feedback history and as a 'user' styled log entry; toasts reflect success/failure.

steps.description: Open Logs or Feedback tab on an in_progress task and focus feedback textarea
Type a feedback message and press Ctrl+Enter
Message is sent, toast confirms success, feedback entry appears in feedback history and a corresponding 'user' log entry is appended
Type a message at 2001 characters and attempt to send
Character counter prevents send and shows 2000 max validation
Click send button with valid message while mocking API to return an error
Error toast displayed and message remains in input for retry

title: Typed API Client & Hooks: query keys, caching, and optimistic update for approve
description: Ensure TanStack Query hooks use stable query keys, caching works across components, and approving a task uses optimistic update that reverts on error.

steps.description: Open task detail and another component that reads the same task (e.g., task list sidebar)
Trigger Approve action and set mutation to perform optimistic update to 'approved' immediately
Both task detail and list view immediately show 'approved' status due to optimistic update
Mock approve API to return error
UI reverts to previous status and error toast displayed

title: Zustand State & Persistence: sidebar collapse and theme persist across sessions
description: UI preferences like collapsed sidebar and theme selection persist via Zustand store and localStorage; verify persistence across page reloads and new tabs.

steps.description: Collapse the sidebar and set theme to dark
Reload the page
Sidebar remains collapsed and theme remains dark after reload
Open application in a new tab
Preferences persist across sessions and tabs

title: Routing & Pages: per-route loading and error boundaries
description: Test that per-route loading skeletons show during data loads and per-route error boundaries display destructive alerts and retry options when route data fetch fails.

steps.description: Navigate to /tasks/[taskId] and simulate slow network to display loading state
Route shows loading skeleton specific to task detail
Mock API to return 500 for detail fetch
Per-route error boundary renders destructive alert with retry button
Click retry after backend restored
Data loads and normal page UI is restored

title: Accessibility: keyboard navigation, focus states, and screen reader labels
description: Ensure keyboard-only navigation works for primary flows (task list, open task, actions, command palette), focus is visible, and key UI elements have accessible labels and roles.

steps.description: Tab through the main layout to reach the Command Palette shortcut focusable control
Press Cmd/Ctrl+K to open command palette and type to search
Command palette receives focus, is operable via keyboard, and results are selectable by arrow keys + Enter
Use only keyboard to navigate to a task, open its Actions menu, and trigger 'Execute' confirmation dialog
All interactive controls show visible focus indicators and dialogs trap focus; status badge and logs region expose ARIA labels / roles for screen readers

title: Performance: initial page load and navigation timings
description: Sample performance assertions: initial page load under 3s on supported browser profile, navigation transitions under 500ms, and log streaming latency under 100ms when SSE emits.

steps.description: Measure full page load time for /tasks on a realistic test device and network profile
Initial page load completes under 3 seconds
Navigate from tasks list to a task detail and measure time to render primary content
Primary content renders under 500ms
Trigger a log event via SSE and measure time until rendering
Log appears within 100ms of SSE event emission

title: Error Handling: SSE 'error' and 'timeout_warning' events surface via toasts and UI
description: When SSE sends 'error' or 'timeout_warning' events, the client surfaces appropriate toasts/alerts and provides actionable retry/extend options.

steps.description: Open Logs tab and mock SSE to emit 'timeout_warning' event with suggested remaining time
Timeout warning appears in logs and a toast or inline alert suggests 'Extend' action
Click 'Extend' from alert, mock extend API success
Extend API call is made and toast confirms extension
Mock SSE to emit 'error' event
Destructive toast or in-UI alert shown and connection status changes to error with retry option

title: Security: API client handles and surfaces authorization errors gracefully
description: When API returns 401/403, the client should surface a clear toast/alert and provide guidance (e.g., permission required) without exposing sensitive details.

steps.description: Perform an action that triggers an API call (e.g., Execute) while mock server responds 403
UI shows a clear, non-sensitive error toast/alert (permission denied) and action loading state is cleared
Attempt to open changes page where backend returns 401
Per-route error boundary displays a non-sensitive message and provides contact or retry guidance

title: Diff Viewer: large diffs performance and virtualization
description: When diffs include many files and large file contents, the diff viewer should remain responsive (scrolling and toggles) and employ virtualization if implemented.

steps.description: Open Changes tab for a task containing 200+ file changes and very large file diffs
UI remains responsive while scrolling and toggling split/unified modes; no main-thread jank exceeding 200ms per frame
Select a deeply nested file and toggle syntax highlighting
Diff content renders correctly; memory usage remains within acceptable bounds for the environment

title: Feedback System: feedback history pagination and visibility
description: Verify feedback history displays recent messages, supports pagination or lazy loading, and older feedback remains viewable; feedback items link back into logs.

steps.description: Populate feedback history with 50+ entries for a task
Open feedback history and scroll to load more
Older feedback items load via pagination or infinite scroll and each item links to timestamped location within logs

title: Task Actions availability matrix across statuses
description: Verify that contextual task actions (Execute, Cancel, Extend, Approve, Retry, View PR) are enabled/disabled per task status as per specification.

steps.description: For tasks in statuses: backlog, planning, in_progress, awaiting_review, approved, failed, done - open task detail for each status

Execute is enabled for backlog/planning where applicable; Cancel enabled when in_progress/planning; Extend enabled on timeout_warning/pending extension states; Approve only enabled when awaiting_review; Retry enabled on failed; View PR enabled when done/approved and PR URL present

title: Command Palette: quick navigation and actions
description: Ensure Command Palette (Cmd/Ctrl+K) can search tasks, create new task, and toggle theme; results are accessible and execute actions directly.

steps.description: Press Cmd/Ctrl+K to open command palette
Type a partial task title and select a result with keyboard
Selecting a task result navigates to its detail
In command palette, select 'Create Task' action
Create Task dialog opens
Use command to toggle theme
Theme toggles and preference persists

title: Typed Hooks: query invalidation after mutations
description: After performing mutations (create, approve, retry, cancel), ensure relevant TanStack Query caches are invalidated or updated so UI shows consistent state across components.

steps.description: Open tasks list and task detail for a task
Perform a mutation (e.g., Approve) from task detail
Tasks list cache is invalidated or updated and shows new status without manual refresh
Perform a create task mutation
Tasks list receives new item (via optimistic update or refetch) and new task detail page is reachable

title: Edge Case: extremely long title/description rendering and truncation
description: UI should handle very long titles/descriptions gracefully with truncation, tooltips, or expand controls without layout breakage.

steps.description: Create or mock a task with a 5000-character title and a 20000-character description
Task list shows truncated title with tooltip or ellipsis; task detail shows description with readable layout and optional 'show more' control without breaking page layout

title: Global Error Handling: toasts and in-UI alerts for API failures
description: Ensure global API failures surface via Sonner toasts and in-UI alerts where appropriate, with actions for retrying or reporting.

steps.description: Simulate intermittent API failures for a list fetch (e.g., return 502 then success on retry)
Global error toast appears describing the failure; a retry control is offered in UI
Click retry in in-UI alert or toast and return success
UI recovers and data displays normally
